argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_axaddf | |- + : ( CC X. CC ) --> CC |
| 2 | 1 | #P_fovcl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( A + B ) e. CC ) |
\
 Closure law for addition of complex numbers.  Axiom 4 of 22 for real and complex numbers, derived from ZF set theory.  This construction-dependent theorem should not be referenced directly, nor should the proven axiom ~ ax-addcl be used later.  Instead, in most cases use ~ addcl .  (Contributed by NM, 14-Jun-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
